prompt: Process monthly payroll for Greek company with 45 employees, calculate EFKA contributions for all insurance categories, handle salary changes and new hires, and generate submission-ready files for EFKA portal.
expectations: Calculates employer and employee contributions using current Greek rates (24.56% main, 3% auxiliary, etc.)
Handles different employee categories and insurance types correctly
Processes salary changes with retroactive adjustments if needed
Manages new hire registrations within 8-day EFKA deadline
Generates EFKA-compatible XML submission files
Cross-validates contribution calculations with payroll data
Integrates with banking for payment scheduling
Creates comprehensive monthly processing report

files.name: efka_monthly_processing.json

prompt: Handle complete employee lifecycle from onboarding through termination including EFKA registration, contribution tracking, and final settlement calculations. Ensure compliance with Greek employment law and EFKA requirements.
expectations: Manages complete employee onboarding with EFKA registration within required timeframes
Tracks employee data changes and updates EFKA records accordingly
Calculates contributions for different employment scenarios (overtime, bonuses, etc.)
Processes employee terminations with final contribution calculations
Generates required clearance certificates and documentation
Maintains audit trail of all employee lifecycle events
Integrates with payroll systems for seamless data flow
Ensures compliance with Greek labor law and EFKA regulations

files.name: employee_lifecycle_data.json

prompt: Generate comprehensive EFKA compliance report for Greek company including deadline monitoring, penalty risk assessment, and cross-system integration status. Provide actionable recommendations for compliance improvement.
expectations: Analyzes current EFKA compliance status across all employees and deadlines
Identifies upcoming deadlines and potential penalty risks
Reviews cross-system integration with AADE, banking, and payroll systems
Calculates financial impact of compliance gaps or penalties
Provides specific actionable recommendations for improvement
Generates management-ready report suitable for Greek business context
Includes historical compliance trends and performance metrics
Offers cost-benefit analysis of compliance automation investments

files.name: efka_compliance_analysis.json

prompt: Process complex EFKA scenario with multiple employee categories, overtime calculations, bonus payments, and part-time workers. Handle retroactive salary adjustments and ensure accurate contribution calculations for all scenarios.
expectations: Handles different EFKA insurance categories with varying contribution rates
Calculates overtime contributions at correct rates (1.5x base rate)
Processes bonus payments (13th salary, vacation bonus) with proper contribution treatment
Manages part-time worker contributions proportional to working hours
Handles retroactive salary adjustments with contribution recalculations
Ensures compliance with maximum contribution base limits
Generates detailed breakdown of all calculation components
Validates all calculations against Greek employment law requirements

files.name: complex_payroll_scenario.json
